explains: n. 火蜥蜴；蝾螈目动物；耐火的人；烤箱

sentences.en: A salamander embryo can attract algae inside its tissues and cells.
sentences.cn: 蝾螈胚胎却会吸引藻类进入组织和细胞。

sentences.en: The experiment needs to be replicated independently in other salamander species.
sentences.cn: 这项实验需要在其他种类的蝾螈身上进行独立的复制。

sentences.en: The dusky salamander lives only in slow-moving streams where organic debris settles and accumulates.
sentences.cn: 灰蝾螈只生活在缓慢流动的溪流中，有机碎片在此沉淀堆积。
